short_description_localized.en: Featuring four-fixture bathrooms and beautiful Manhattan views, our 800 square foot City View King One Bedroom Suites offer quintessential Manhattan charm and are situated on floors 14 to 21.

images.name: City-View-King-One-Bed-Suite-Manhattan-View-ADA-Living-Room
images.caption: Living Room
images.alt:
This one-bedroom suite offers captivating views of New York City’s skyline. The suite offers an entry way with double door closet, a well-appointed living room featuring a comfortable sofa and coffee table overlooking the 40” wall mounted TV and console with mini bar. There are 2 side chairs and side table along at the far side of the living room. An executive writing desk and chair completes the room. 
The comfortable bedroom features either a king sized bed or twin beds, an arm chair with side table on the far side of the room.  The twin bed set up has a night stand between both beds with Bose Wave studio radio featuring Bluetooth connectivity and alarm clock.The four fixture Turkish marble-clad bathroom features a pedestal sink, 30 x 60” roll-in shower removable bath seat, soaking tub with oversized shower heads, plush bathrobes, towels and exclusive Etro bath amenities.
